issue.title: [Rust] Documentation for slicing array data has the wrong sign
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9059](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9059). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the slice_data function in array.rs, the docstring says it panics if offset+length is less than data.len(), the code actually panics if offset + length is greater than data.len()
